explains: v. 遵守，符合；顺从，随潮流；一致，相吻合

sentences.en: The building does not conform with safety regulations.
sentences.cn: 这座建筑物不符合安全条例。

sentences.en: The lamp has been designed to conform to new safety standards.
sentences.cn: 该灯设计得符合新的安全标准。

sentences.en: This mark signifies that the products conform to an approved standard.
sentences.cn: 这个标志说明这些产品符合指定的标准。
